title: Bitcoinking99
author: Bitcoinking99
content: Website   Â  Â  Â  Twitter   Â  Â  Â   Telegram   Â  Â  Â    Telegram 1. The bounty campaign will be managed by Â bitcoinking992. All participants must join Bounty telegram group.3. Refrain from promoting talking about bounty programs in project chat groups. An immediate ban from company cha groups. Please ask your bounty-related questions in our bounty group.4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior may result in your being rejected.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming will get you disqualified from the bounty program and all your accounts will be permanently banned.6. Red Trust accounts will not be accepted in any way.7. All participants must submit their weekly reports to this bounty thread. For every week, you need to create new report. Anyone submitting the same work twice will be rejected.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Forum Username:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Forum Profile Link:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Telegram Username:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Participated Campaigns:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â BSC Wallet Address:BOUNTY ALLOCATIONTwitter _ 35%Telegram _ 25%Discord _ 20%Reddit _ 20% Week List Week 1 (28.03 - 02.04)Week 2 (03.04 - 09.04)Week 3 (10.04 - 16.04)Week 4 (17.04 - 23.04)Week 5 (24.05 - 30.04)Week 6 (01.05 - 07.05)Week 7 (08.05 - 14.05)Week 8 (15.05 - 21.05) Master SpreadsheetÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Â Â Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Rules: Â 1. Every participant must follow UCKÂ Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use hashtags #Luckyducky Â #presale #pancake #bsc #Binanceâ€¯â€¯â€¯ #btcâ€¯â€¯â€¯ #FLOKICEO #gem #NFTs  Join Here Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | UCK Â Ambassador.(Example: Â | bitcoinking99 Ambassador)2. Replace your profile picture with UCK.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. You must wear UCK avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes. Join Here Rewards:5 stakes/weekâ€¢ Maximum 5 posts per week.Rules:â€¢ Write your posts in crypto currency group.â€¢ Only positive posts will be rewarded. Posts like Hi, Hello, Good project, will not be counted.â€¢ Do not SPAM, if you have any questions ask in the bounty group.â€¢ We count only 1 post per day, submit report weekly to receive stakes. Join Here Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the LIFE. website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots, r/altcoin, r/defi and etc.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. You must join Telegram here : https://t.me/luckyduckycoin Join Here
